A female character has just removed that small item.
What the character says after the major item has been taken off.
What the character says when a male character has started masturbating.
What the character says once the male character's chest is visible.
What the character says after the female character's chest is visible, and has a size value of "large".
What they say to a male NPC who has lost a round
What the character says when a female character has lost a hand while nude, and must masturbate.
What they say to a male player who has lost a round
What the character says after the male character's crotch is visible, and has a size value of "small".
A male character is about to remove a small item, with the type "extra".
What the character says when a male character "finishes" masturbating.

A female character is about to remove a small item, with the type "extra".
What the character says when they win the game. Can happen in any stage.
What the character says before a female loses an item with the "major" type.
A male character is about to remove a clothing item with the type "minor".
What the character says when a female character "finishes" masturbating.

What the character says when a female character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their chest. For NPC's, this is a clothing element on the "upper" location, with the "important" type.
What the character says while a male character is masturbating.
The female character has just removed that minor item.

What the character says when a male character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their crotch. For NPC's, this is a clothing element on the "lower" location, with the "important" type.

epilogue.gender: "male", "female", or "any". This is the gender of player that can see the ending
epilogue.title: This is the title of the character's ending, and the start of a new ending

screen.img: filename (including extension) of the background image for a screen. Also the start of a new screen

text.x: The x-position of the text box. Specifically, the position of the text box's left side. This can be a percentage, or the word "centered"
text.y: The y-position of the top of the text box. Must be a percentage.
text.width: The width of a text box. This is optional. Must be a percentage.
text.arrow: "up", "down", "left", or "right". Gives the text box a dialogue arrow in the specified direction. Can be left out, if you don't want the text box to be an arrow.
text.content: The text in the text box.
This is text that will be seen by the player. It has a width of 34% and an arrow pointing down.
This is a centered text box. It has the default width and an arrow pointing right.
This third text box has minimum amount of values specified. It uses the default width, and has no arrow.
